name: Turbo Rev
tag_list: affiliate-program, advertising, online-advertising, online-marketing, revenue-earning, lead-generation
overview:
TurboRev is an Affiliate Progam that connects Publishers (also know as Affiliates) with Advertisers (AKA Merchants) offering complete reporting tools, cutting-edge tracking technology, strong marketing tools and reliable support.

The Turborev affiliate program network provides the tools necessary for Advertisers to get enhanced exposure & for Publishers to maximize their revenue earning potential with the highest payouts on the Net. Advertisers only need to post their ads on the network and Publishers just have to take the ads they want to promote, receiving commissions when a lead or sale is generated.

Turbo Rev’s MDTAÂ© (Multi-Dimensional Targeting Ability) technology dynamically matches online advertising opportunities with Web Site visitorsâ€™ key browsing profile characteristics (geo-location, language, OS and browser based) in real-time, delivering the best possible ad to the Web Site visitor, maximizing potential sales and conversions. the opportunity to earn money from a variety of high converting offers and capitalize on ad placement results.
